mapper.select: SELECT c.id as idColaborador, c.noPersonal as noPersonal, c.contrasena as contrasena, p.id as idPersona, p.nombre as nombre, p.apellidoPaterno as apellidoPaterno, p.apellidoMaterno as apellidoMaterno, p.correo as correo, rc.id as idRolColaborador, rc.numLicencia as numLicencia, rc.rol as rol FROM Colaborador c INNER JOIN Persona p ON p.id = c.idPersona INNER JOIN RolColaborador rc ON rc.idColaborador = c.id WHERE noPersonal = #{noPersonal} AND contrasena = #{password} AND rc.rol = 'Conductor';

SELECT c.id as idColaborador, c.noPersonal as noPersonal, p.id as idPersona, p.nombre as nombre, p.apellidoPaterno as apellidoPaterno, p.apellidoMaterno as apellidoMaterno, p.correo as correo, TO_BASE64(p.foto) as foto, rc.id as idRolColaborador, rc.numLicencia as numLicencia, rc.rol as rol FROM Colaborador c INNER JOIN Persona p ON p.id = c.idPersona INNER JOIN RolColaborador rc ON rc.idColaborador = c.id WHERE noPersonal = #{noPersonal} AND contrasena = #{password} AND rc.rol != 'Conductor';
